description: The three hostages were mistakenly killed in Gaza on Friday by Israeli troops.
maintext: Since the end of a temporary ceasefire between Israel and Hamas earlier this month, families of the hostages have urged the Israeli government to reach a new truce for at least some of the captives to be freed. The initial deal led to the release of more than 100 hostages, in exchange for Palestinians held in Israeli jails.
title: Israel Gaza: Hostages shot by IDF put out 'SOS' sign written with leftover food
